# BNNS.NormalizationType.layer(normalizationAxis:)

**Case**

Layer normalization.

## Declaration

```swift
case layer(normalizationAxis: Int)
```

## Normalization Types

- **BNNS.NormalizationType.batch(movingMean:movingVariance:)**: Batch normalization with optional moving averages.
- **BNNS.NormalizationType.group(groupCount:)**: Group normalization.
- **BNNS.NormalizationType.instance(movingMean:movingVariance:)**: Instance normalization with optional moving averages.
